meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of the Czech Republic.
meanings.sent1: In the Czech Republic, you can buy many things with koruny.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for koruny at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine only accepted koruny, so I had to find a different one.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a handful of shiny koruny, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of koruny clinking together in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: Plural form of koruna, the currency of the Czech Republic.
meanings.sent1: She counted the koruny in her wallet to see if she had enough for the souvenir.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper handed me a handful of koruny as change.
meanings.sent3: The children played with fake koruny in their pretend store.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the jingle of koruny as people made purchases.
meanings.sent5: The old man's eyes lit up when he saw the bag of koruny his grandson brought him.
